documents.document: Going to be at sea for a few days without mobile service. Hopefully the world is still here when we reach land!!
@gemzina what is her Instagram name please ðŸ˜Š
@knitsch Paul saw her knitting so introduced us ðŸ˜‚ So lovely
The staff on this cruise are so multinational I bet they are glad to be on a pacific cruise route!
Last night I met the lovely lady from Hawkes Bay who runs August Knit Nights! We are the only 2 who knit in public on our cruise @knitsch
While everyone else on the cruise focuses on the interior of a floating city... I enjoy the real beauty of New Zealâ€¦ https://t.co/e2CEA1MUDU
@YvonneMilroy @L_To the staff love that we are from here! Getting special attention ðŸ˜Š
Being on holiday in my own city is quite relaxing! Now back in my 15 story floating resort with a glass of French Rose #Cruiselife
@L_To @YvonneMilroy and I'm on holiday on a cruise currently docked in my HOME CITY LOL
@gurrlwithacurl @getbeef lol I read panties hehe
Good morning Wellington! I'm waving at you from my veranda on that wee boat coming into your harbour ðŸ˜†
@wandaharland wow cool! I'll have to get a copy ðŸ˜ƒ Thanks!
@timeless_soles found lovely cafe- wild one
@timeless_soles you certainly turned on the sunshine for us!!
I'm always the only one leaning over their private balcony at night and it's so peaceful I don't get why everyone else isn't!
PSA: If you are on a cruise ship that charges a limb to iron a garment, I've discovered you can iron a dress with a hairdryer on hot!!!
Niece age 11 to Mr "you are plain with words on your tshirt but Auntie Amie is all creative"
Room boy laid out my Frieda Kahlo nighty in a lovely waist defining pose #cruiselife
I'm at sea on a ship and the best thing is peacefully sitting alone on my balcony watching night fall with a glass of Pinot Noir ðŸ‘Œ
@gurrlwithacurl I'm still having wine before joining the ship queue and my cheeks are a rose blush hehe
Good morning Te Atatu Peninsula! Can't wait to board the floating city later today ðŸ˜ƒ
@timeless_soles ekkk hopefully! I'm so excited ðŸ˜ƒ
Hardly recognise Auckland - it's been taken over by roads and cars and roadworks!
@littlemisspie very happy with this cab trip thanks ðŸ˜Š
Mr reckons they send trainee pilots from Wellington to Auckland so they can practice landing - it certainly felt like it!
"Ma'am do you have knitting needles in your bag? Those funny ones?" Me: you mean circular, yes. "OK then, carry on." ðŸ˜‚
I pronounce myself Queen of Cruise Packing! Weight allowed 23kg. My bag? 23kgs! Woot woot!
@littlemisspie wow thats good
@L_To That's because you are a princess xx
@L_To te atatu - have worked out airport bus transfer to AT bus route ðŸ˜Š
@L_To Doesn't look like it - guess we could bus futher out then get one...
@L_To can you get one from airport?
Also, what is the best auckland bus app? please?
@robotexplosion We loved the sunset Yacht cruise!
Ok Auckland, best advice to get from Airport to Te Atatu without going broke please?
I love Bonjela. I don't think you ever grow out of liking it!!
I am so struggling to condense my shoe choices down for taking on a cruise - 12 nights of dining and dancing...
So the sevens are on the day our cruise docks in Wellington. Great reason not to get of the ship!!
Ollie makes an awesome yarn holder @knitsch #knitting https://t.co/dh0BR5dNYF
@Furwreckingball exactly - a family member or friend of the 4 has to notice something strange
@TVNZondemand I'm trying to watch The Level on my iPad and I keep getting error "could not load this video resource..." - any ideas?
@timeless_soles It stops for day in Tauranga - I think Thursday from memory
It amazes me that a woman can be stabbed and shot by 4 suspects in Lower Hutt and they can't be identified. Someone must have an idea who.
@robotexplosion I'm having trouble choosing shoes for all my evening outfits lol
@robotexplosion Its a really big ship, we have a balcony room :-D Mum booked it nearly 2 yrs ago LOL
@robotexplosion 13 days starting at Auckland around Bay of Islands, all down east coast to Milford & Doubtful, then Hobart ending in Sydney!
Only 4 more sleeps!!! #celebritycruises
@YvonneMilroy exactly! Funny thing I now work for a designer part time and love it
@YvonneMilroy Fashion designer! But my Dad thought it would be like living a life of rock n roll and all that goes with lol
@annikakes @badtom I'm on the flat and I thought my new double glazing was going to crack!
Where is this Weather Bomb???
@TheSewphist guessing a gust ðŸ˜‚
@_vitaminK @_PocketWitch almost hehe
@_vitaminK @_PocketWitch I was at their concerts while you were in nappies ðŸ˜‚
@paulbrislen I'm wondering the same about Wellington?!!
@josiecampbell Thank you! it's my favorite design yet - going to make one for myself I've decided ðŸ˜Š
Today I delivered this made-to-order giant crochet bed runner to a delighted customer ðŸ˜Š https://t.co/7AYvtpacPr
@consumernz I've got the Paderno and it's rather good https://t.co/Ngdp1zUyaG
Can you help? She was my neighours neice :-( Police release descriptions of Lois Tolley murder suspects and cars https://t.co/AyPQ7daIsf
@YvonneMilroy was rather amazing! Think it was western springs and Dragon was the opening act. So long ago!
@YvonneMilroy @ComplexPop Elton John 29 yrs ago at mount smart I think?
At gym a personal trainer told her client not to bowl me over. Reply was "She's a @webstock girl, I can't bowl her over!" #webstock #tshirt
@gurrlwithacurl I'm so stoked! Even Sasha liked them -normally she will act up if someone is dodgy
Met the nicest couple via KiwiHouseSitters tonight! Feeling very confident our babies will be well cared for :-)
@littlemisspie my last speeding ticket was 55 in a 50km :-( Momentary laspe of looking at the speedo sigh
The problem with cool @threadless t-shirts is I get people look at my chest and say "oh that is great"
@Furwreckingball plus our vet clinic is owned by them now - I get dog food from https://t.co/vxCeikXdPY
In under a year I have earned 45,000 points in the Friends for Life club at Animates. Yip I'm a VIP. And broke.
@gilly_nash arrrggghhhh no fair! I LOVE Karen Millen! Can't wait to see pics!
@gilly_nash one will be flash - the other is anyones guess lol But yes exciting and I've already bought a dress :-D
@gilly_nash I haven't been to one in over 10 yrs and have 2 in the next few months also!
Seriously are there still idiots who let off fireworks while it's still daylight!??
@BritInWgtn I'm not allowed to play anymore lol
@paolabrett @CafeWeka in the UK they wouldn't let me take more than 2 weeks over xmas. I had to quit to come home for longer!
@paolabrett @CafeWeka we end up taking leave without pay during the year after Mr is forced to take weeks off over xmas :-(
@JohnJCampbell I only managed 6 books but two of them were by @Kiwimrsmac and my husband loved them also!
One of the housesitter responders is connected to @amscraig on LinkedIn so that's a good endorsement right!
@gurrlwithacurl you can still contact everyone who had responded but stops new responses thank goodness!
@gurrlwithacurl because I was first time user I had to place add to get account and apparently everyone loves dogs lol
Ok I'm feeling stressed at the number of replies to an ad on Kiwi House Sitters. I should deactivate right so I can go through them?
@roxyleopold @gurrlwithacurl I feel bad I will have to let some of them down now! One is a couple which means more attention to pets
@gurrlwithacurl I appear to have placed a great ad as I now have 9 people begging to look after my dogs! crazy lol
@gurrlwithacurl I've had 3 awesome responses already!!! Thanks again lovely x
@gurrlwithacurl That's a really great site!
@gurrlwithacurl oh cool! Thanks for that ðŸ˜ƒ
@FitKiwi @Capt_Caffiend Thank you!
@gurrlwithacurl Thank you - Petone :-)
Struggling to find a house/pet sitter for 2weeks from 23/1. Can anyone recomend someone? 3 smallish spaniels and 2 cats need minding.
@L_To make sure you contact council too - can't have a dangerous animal on the streets uncontrolled!
@L_To i was beside myself and my wee niece was telling Ollie to be strong in case he lost his sister - wasnt that bad though
@L_To I did because there was a visible puncture wound in shoulder. Just missed main artery! Worth taking for peace of mind xx
@L_To she panted for hours. Perked up a few days later. How are you doing today?
@YvonneMilroy 2 steps... push scream. Done
@L_To I totally understand the fear! Sasha was attacked a few years back and it was awful seeing her afterwards ðŸ˜¢
@niceties although I have heard that Niue is quiet and inexpensive as you can take your own food.
@niceties Raro is the best
@harrismint I'm going to the garden to eat ... *that worm*
Back at work today so if you are in Petone pop into @DerynSchmidt - beautiful clothing and the sale has just started! Would love to see you
Home 2 days and already subjected to 4th episode of masterchef. In bed watching The Other Boleyn Girl instead â˜º
@ohthatwelshguy not sure I could watch having been a severe victim of bullying ðŸ˜°
